
### CONTRIBUTING.md

```markdown
# Contributing to TextUtils

We welcome all contributions that improve the project. Here's how you can contribute.

## Reporting Bugs

Use GitHub's issue tracker to report bugs. Be as precise as possible to help with quick resolution.

## Submitting Changes

- Fork the project
- Create your feature branch (`git checkout -b my-new-feature`)
- Commit your changes (`git commit -am 'Add some feature'`)
- Push to the branch (`git push origin my-new-feature`)
- Create a new Pull Request

## Testing

Ensure that your code passes all existing tests and, if possible, add new tests for any new code.

## Questions?

If you have any questions, feel free to open an issue in the GitHub issue tracker of the project.
